attributes.action: In the wake of Rotherham, where were the charities? An investigation into the  failings of Childline and NSPCC
attributes.additional_details:
In the wake of Rotherham and other Child Abuse scandals; where were the child protection charities involved?

This petition is a demand for an investigation in failings of childline and nspcc and other high profile charity organizations that failed to

1) Act on information
2) Bring to the publics attention
3) Report to the Authorities, and to continue reporting until they found an authority to take up the cause.

These charities take huge sums from government and the public. Do not pay tax yet employ board members at very high costs.

Despite that, they have failed to live up to their reputation and mission.
